author: Alison Kalinowski
text: 'Great food and great staff! This is my new favorite lunch spot for a delicious sandwich or salad. The restaurant itself is very well decorated as well. Definitely a hidden gem in downtown Hoboken!'

author: Lauren Dziubinsky
text: 'I cannot say enough amazing things about this place: from the venue to the food to the people
column5:
Justin and his team are so accommodating and easy to work with.  He customized the menu for our half jamaican family and all were incredibly impressed and asked to take home leftovers!
The food is outrageous: not your typical catering.  Delicious and beautifully presented (white platters no chafing dishes).  Youâ€™ll want to eat the marinara with a spoon.

The backyard is adorable and spacious: easily fit 50 people.

We will find reasons to celebrate and always make One12 our first destination.  We will be back often as soon as we finish these amazing leftovers.'

author: David DiGiacomo
text: 'Good food very nice staff!!'

author: Victor R Salvador V
text: 'Great food

author: Danyelle Dell'Olio
text: "The food at One12 is delicious! The veggies are super fresh and tasty
column5: the meat is great - everything is fantastic! I'm so happy this restaurant opened so close to home.ðŸ˜Š The back patio is a pleasure to hang out in
column7: and everyone is super friendly. One12 is for sure the new go-to spot for me!"

author: Nick Silicato
text: 'One of the best meals Iâ€™ve had in a long time. The back patio is beautiful and perfect if you have little kids and the service was excellent. My family and I will be back again very soon.'

author: Daniel Kolic
text: "This new spot in Hoboken is the place to be if you want an amazing meal! I have had breakfast and lunch there on multiple occasions and have never left disappointed!\n\nThe restaurant is impeccable
column5: very tastefully decorated and all of the staff always has a smile on their face
column6: it doesn't matter if it's 7 am or 7 pm.\n\nFor breakfast
column7: the breakfast burrito or the healthy wrap is an excellent choice. The breakfast sandwiches are phenomenal as well.\n\nThe specials are updated daily and all taste amazing. I especially loved their taco Tuesday's
column8: you can tell that all of their food is fresh and that they use the best ingredients in their meals. Ever since my first visit
column9: I have been back multiple times and plan to continue to visit. When you visit don't forget to try one of their tasty rice balls or their famous chicken cutlets! You won't be disappointed!"

author: Stacy Hoenigmann
text: "Delicious rice balls- I recommend the Basil ones- and really crispy and perfectly cooked chicken cutlets. The food is a la carte and made quickly  so it's easy to stop in and try a few things if you're on the go!"

author: Jonathan Pepe
text: 'Love thier salads
column5: get them a couple times a week for lunch. Rice balls are also delicious. Staff are friendly and attentive. Great back patio. BYOB.'

author: Nicole Jala
text: 'Great outdoor space and delicious salads!'

author: SAMUEL RODRIGUEZ
text: 'Staff is very friendly
column5: food is really good. My new favorite spot.'

author: Sandy Schwarz
text: 'Just moved to the neighborhood and Iâ€™m so glad to have found this gem! Follow them on Instagram and you can see the specials they post each day. Today they posted about a brisket with a side of veggies and it was the perfect dinner! Looking forward to trying their pasta and breakfast sandwiches!'

author: Jonathan Miller
text: 'Great new spot in the heart of downtown Hoboken!'

author: Peter Wehmeyer
text: 'One12Hoboken came highly recommended and far exceeded our expectations. Came with a small group & sat out on a beautiful patio & had giant plates of absolutely delicious food.\nThe service & ambiance was awesome as well. Highly recommended'

author: James Barracato
text: 'Excellent food and great service. Great variety of daily specials. Super friendly and attentive staff.  This small business is a great addition to the neighborhood.'

author: Richard Fedor
text: "Recently had a small gathering at our house that One12 catered which was incredible.  Our guests couldn't say enough wonderful things about the food.  The Sloppy Giuseppe
column6: the finger sandwiches of eggplant/roasted peppers/fresh mozzarella and the mixed roasted veggies plater were a hit. Then we brought out the desserts of chocolate brownies
column7: blonde brownies and apple tarts.....our guests were blown away with how fresh everything was
column8: how creamy and delicious.  They want to know when they can  come over again if One12 will be providing the food. Thank you so much for thinking of everything and letting us just enjoy the afternoon."

author: Danny Fedor
text: 'Excellent experience
column5: from the food to the service. Awesome place'

author: Justin Calabrese
text: 'Breakfast burritos on point! And the guys inside are super friendly'

author: V. Dimitrov
text: 'This place is a must go! Delicious food
column5: very friendly staff and very clean space. One of the best in town!! If I can give 10 stars
column6: this is the place that deserves it. Totally recommend!!!'

author: Adam A
text: 'The Sicilian rice balls were out of this world!!!!!! A must try!!! Definitely will recommend to my friends!!!'

author: Maryann Seriale
text: 'Delicious food & really friendly service. The rice balls were the best Iâ€™ve ever tasted. The everyday specials are always an unexpected treat and they have a nice\nCatering menu as well.'
